_header: Alas what shall we friars do
_description: An ironic lament of the friars, in answer to 5860 — nine quatrains

CamStJohn195.First Lines:
Allas what schul we freris doNow lewed men kun holy
                    writ…
CamStJohn195.Last Lines:
…Men schul fynde vnneþe a frereIn englonde wiþin a
                    whille
